item.title: Unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @P_R_0_Rusher P R 0 Rusher
item.description:
@P_R_0_Rusher wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:8, topic:367769”] if (command.startsWith(“item”)) {
if(!inCombat) {
if(isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
try {
String[] token = command.split(" ");
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 14879) {
if(newItemID != 14878) {
if(newItemID != 14877) {
if(newItemID != 14876) {
if(newItemID != 14880) {
if(newItemID != 14881) {
if(newItemID != 14882) {
if(newItemID != 14883) {
if(newItemID != 14884) {
if(newItemID != 14885) {
if(newItemID != 14886) {
if(newItemID != 14887) {
if(newItemID != 14888) {
if(newItemID != 14889) {
if(newItemID != 14890) {
if(newItemID != 14891) {
if(newItemID != 14892) {
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);

} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn a PvP artifact! Go PK !”);

                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        sM("I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::item 995 1.");
                    
              } else {
              sM("You can't spawn in the wilderness!");
              
              } else {
              sM("You can't spawn items in combat!");
              }
                }
            }

Try that. I made some modifications to the code. There were brackets throughout the entire code too much. I don’t use delta, but it looks right to me now. If it doesn’t work, add one more closing bracket. I forget if it’s needed or not :/[/quote]

Still 100 Errors :S

Read full topic

item.title: Unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

    if (command.startsWith("item")) {
           if(!inCombat) {
           if(isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                    try {
                        String[] token = command.split(" ");
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 14879) {
if(newItemID != 14878) {
if(newItemID != 14877) {
if(newItemID != 14876) {
if(newItemID != 14880) {
if(newItemID != 14881) {
if(newItemID != 14882) {
if(newItemID != 14883) {
if(newItemID != 14884) {
if(newItemID != 14885) {
if(newItemID != 14886) {
if(newItemID != 14887) {
if(newItemID != 14888) {
if(newItemID != 14889) {
if(newItemID != 14890) {
if(newItemID != 14891) {
if(newItemID != 14892) {
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);

} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn a PvP artifact! Go PK !”);

                    } catch (Exception e) {
                        sM("I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::item 995 1.");
                    
              } else {
              sM("You can't spawn in the wilderness!");
              
              } else {
              sM("You can't spawn items in combat!");
              }
                }
            }

Try that. I made some modifications to the code. There were brackets throughout the entire code too much. I don’t use delta, but it looks right to me now. If it doesn’t work, add one more closing bracket. I forget if it’s needed or not

item.title: Unspawnable
item.dc:creator: @P_R_0_Rusher P R 0 Rusher
item.description:
@P_R_0_Rusher wrote:

Hello,
I Wanne Make Certain Items Unspawnable But It Wont Work.
I Tried Alot Of Topics But Not Even 1 Would Work Somewane Please Help Me!
And How To Make That You Dont Lose Certain Items

                if (command.startsWith("item")) {
				if(!inCombat) {
				if(isInPvP(absX, absY, 1)) {
                    try {
                        String[] token = command.split(" ");
                        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(token[1]);
                        int newItemAmount = 1;

                        try {
                            newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(token[2]); // fixup of your pickup
                        } catch (Exception e) {
                            newItemAmount = 1;
                        }

if(newItemID != 14879) {
if(newItemID != 14878) {
if(newItemID != 14877) {
if(newItemID != 14876) {
if(newItemID != 14880) {
if(newItemID != 14881) {
if(newItemID != 14882) {
if(newItemID != 14883) {
if(newItemID != 14884) {
if(newItemID != 14885) {
if(newItemID != 14886) {
if(newItemID != 14887) {
if(newItemID != 14888) {
if(newItemID != 14889) {
if(newItemID != 14890) {
if(newItemID != 14891) {
if(newItemID != 14892) {
if (newItemID <= 25000 && newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sM(“No such item!”);
}

} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn a PvP artifact! Go PK ;)!”);
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
}
} catch (Exception e) {
sM(“I think you typed that wrong, e.g. ::item 995 1.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn in the wilderness!”);
}
} else {
sM(“You can’t spawn items in combat!”);
}
}
}
